QuestData.Title: Grimwing the Devourer
QuestData.Description: You have my thanks for rescuing me from captivity, $c.$b$bHowever, Azoran is no mere demon. He is a powerful eredar who commands great rank within the Burning Legion.$b$bIf you wish to continue with me, I need proof of your strength.$b$bGrimwing the Devourer is the strongest of the felbats and a suitable test of skill. Place the basilisk flesh upon the altar to the north and slay Grimwing when she appears.$b$bReturn to me with her head and I will not doubt your ability.
QuestData.CompletionText: What news do you bring of Grimwing the Devourer?
QuestData.RewardText: Grimwing was a formidable demon... I must say I am impressed with your skill, $n.$b$bThere are many more demons here to kill. It is good to have someone capable at my side.
